snippet: The buyout group, led by Temasek Holdings, Singapore’s government investor, has offered Olam a premium of about 12 percent to where the shares first traded, valuing the company at more than $4 billion.
abstract: The buyout group, led by Temasek Holdings, Singapore’s government investor, has offered Olam a premium of about 12 percent to where the shares first traded, valuing the company at more than $4 billion.

headline.main: Singapore Government Firm Pursues Buyout of Olam International
